Question: This person followed Foul Play with the successful Harold Ramis comedy Caddyshack, in 1980.
Hints: This person played drums with the college band The Leather Canary, headed by school friends Walter Becker and Donald Fagen.
This person was named for his adoptive grandfather Cornelius.
This person was Hasty Pudding's 1993 Man Of The Year, and received a star on the Hollywood Walk of Fame in 1994.
